Description: At The Daley, we're creating a community, with amazing apartments, nearby metro access, and all the best shops and restaurants nearby, nothing is quite like it. When you live here, you'll have access to over 10,000 sq.ft. of amenities, both indoors, outdoors and in the smaller spaces in-between. So, whether you prefer the camaraderie of the crowd, or the intimacy of a quiet nook, we?ve got a place that's just right for you. Boasting the perfect location at only a 2 minute walk to the Shady Grove Metro to a 4 minutes drive to the I-270 on-ramp and even a 10 minute cycle to Rock Creek Regional Park, you can start here and go everywhere. Come as you are?it takes all kinds to make a neighborhood.

It is easy to see why we are the best apartments in Rockville, MD! Residents enjoy the outdoor amenities that you can only find at our Rockville, MD apartments. We have an outdoor grilling area a refreshing swimming pool, and a playground for the children. We are located just a short walk to Rock creek Trails. We are just minutes from Shady Grove and Rockville Town Center. Our townhouses in Rockville, MD offer a great location for any commute. We have easy access to Highway 270 and there is bus transportation nearby as well.

A variety of floor plans offer affordable, comfortable luxury in one- and two-bedroom apartments with sunrooms, balconies or patios. Description: Village Square West in North Bethesda, MD offers spacious 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. We’re at the center of everything you need. Public transit is at your doorstep – MetroBus and Ride-On buses stop here. 10-15-minute walk to Twinbrook Metro station. 5 minutes to the Capital Beltway (I-495) and Rockville Pike with endless shopping, dining & entertainment. Just 3 blocks to grocery stores and everyday services. 5 minutes to Rock Creek Park with trails, fields & courts and Twinbrook Community Recreation Center. Apartment amenities include a large living room with space for plenty of furniture, separate dining area, storage galore, sliding glass doors to an oversized covered balcony or patio, windows on two sides of the apartment (we provide blinds throughout), large open fully-equipped kitchen, and central heat and air conditioning. Utilities are not included in your rent – you pay gas, electricity and water/sewer. Cats are welcome. Property features include a relaxing pool with sundeck, shaded picnic area with grills, two play areas, recycling areas throughout, secure telephone-entry system, mail delivery and laundry facility in each building, on-site management office and 24-hour emergency maintenance. For more information and availability, visit www.villagesquarewest.com.

Description: Picture yourself living a 37-acre private retreat, a place where scenic pathways are lined by flowering gardens and picnic areas shaded by tall oaks. Where a charming hilltop community lodge looks out over an Olympic sized pool and broad sundeck. Where there are plenty places to play and open activity fields offer endless recreational opportunity. Now imagine living here in a striking, amenity-filled garden or mid-rise building apartment home. And imagine it all with Rock Creek Park as your balcony view. Welcome to Halpine View Apartments, a naturally beautiful community in the heart of Rockville. Conveniently located, Twinbrook Metro is just three blocks from your door. And while the setting feels far away you're really no more than a bike ride from Congressional Plaza. The perfect Rockville address. A picture-perfect community. Welcome home to Halpine View Apartments.

Description: When you think of home, you should think of a place that feels just right. Somewhere outside the hustle-bustle of city life, but close enough to tap into the pulse of what's happening. Somewhere you can enjoy the relaxation of suburban sanctuary, yet still be surrounded by the chic aesthetic of modern urban style. That somewhere is The Fenestra at Rockville Town Square. Our well-appointed apartments are so comfortable and conveniently-located that you'll always look forward to coming home. Three mid-rise buildings include spacious residences within steps of all the modern conveniences you could ever need--boutique shopping, delicious dining options and trendy nightspots. The red line Metro is right across the street, making commuting simple. And a vibrant courtyard encourages residents to meet and mingle at seasonal outdoor events. Be a part of what's happening at The Fenestra at Rockville Town Square. You'll feel right at home. Contact us today to schedule a personal tour!

Description:
Rock Creek Woods Apartments are one of the best values in Rockville. Rock Creek Woods offers exceptionally large, well maintained, and reasonably priced apartments in one of the most convenient locations in Montgomery County. Only steps away from public transportation and a busy shopping district, the property is nestled between two parks, creating a feeling of a retreat from the hustle and bustle. Rent includes gas stove, gas heat and water utilities. Electric heat in studio apartments not included. Amenities and Features include: Large 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartments as well as Efficiencies bordered by parkland on two sides. Transportation: Two sheltered Metrobus and Ride-On bus stops at entrance (Twinbrook and Viers Mill) Close to Twinbrook Metrorail and Rockville Pike .Short Walk to Twinbrook Shopping Center, and Twinbrook Community Recreation Center .Outstanding Montgomery County Schools: Twinbrook Elementary (0.6 mi. walk) Julius West Middle School Richard Montgomery High School Large balconies or patios in most apartments

Description: If location, quality, and affordability are important to you, Woodmont Park may be exactly what you're looking for! Ideally situated on Rockville Pike, minutes from the Washington Beltway and I-270, using the Wooton Parkway Express, Woodmont Park offers convenience and accessibility while surrounding you with a relaxed neighborhood setting. Our spacious apartments are available in several smart floor plans and sliding glass doors open to either patios or balconies which overlook landscaped lawns and shaded walkways. Woodmont Park is within walking distance to shopping, restaurants, Metrobus, and Ride On routes, and is minutes from schools, churches, and Metrorail. The beautiful Music Center at Strathmore Hall includes world-class performances. Our apartment homes include wall-to-wall carpeting, window treatments, central air-conditioning, cable ready, laundry facilities and storage. We also offer a swimming pool, basketball court and play areas for the youngsters. Come visit Woodmont Park today...you'll be glad you did!

Prefer not to walk to all that is nearby? Bus stops are located at our community, including a Metrobus stop providing access to the White Flint Metro! Our location is also ideal for NIH, Bethesda Naval Hospital and NRC employees. Along with the convenience of an excellent location, the abundance of on-site amenities and features at your new home offer a unique selection in the area that you will only find at Oxford Square, including controlled access entry, individual washers and dryers, modern eat-in kitchens, balconies and patios, a swimming pool, a fitness center, playground and picnic areas with grills in a beautiful setting with oak accents, picnic areas, and wooded views. Not only do we allow pets, but our pet fees are among the lowest around.

Description: HUGE floor plans and TREMENDOUS location! Villas at Rockville Rental Townhomes and Apartments offer 2, 3 and 4 bedroom floor plans ranging from 1,384 to 2,375 square feet, some containing full basements with storage areas! Our rental homes boast quality, comfort, convenience and excellent service. Enjoy our breakfast bars, thermo-paned energy efficient windows and patio doors, and vast sparkling pool. Located just off of College Parkway, with ride on bus service at your doorstep and quick access to Rockville Pike, Route 28 and I-270, we're literally walking distance to Montgomery College. Our community is located in the top school district in Montgomery County, across the street from top ranking College Gardens Elementary, and just minutes to award winning Richard Montgomery High School. We are a short distance to Shady Grove Metro Station, and just 1.5 miles to Rockville Town Center, boasting all of the shopping, dining and entertainment options you could possibly want. Welcome home

Description:
They say the most stressful things in life are
Losing a job... divorce... and MOVING!
whether you came here for a NEW JOB, acceptance to school program, or just a new HOME.... NO MATTER
....Let me guess, NOW you've been left to search through a stack of EMPTY listings....
....Sort through a bunch of pictures and not very helpful descriptions?
IF YOU'RE LUCKY, an apathetic agent or landlord might actually call you back with little info or care to match what you're looking for.....
And this is just STEP 1!!!!!
Next you'll need to figure out, furniture, parking, commute, etc. Etc. Etc.
I meet hundreds of people move to North Bethesda with the same WANTS..... 
They SPIN THEIR WHEELS with BARE BONES LISTINGS.... 
AND scramble around to get EVERYTHING ELSE they NEED to MOVE...... 
so we decided to put it all in ONE PACKAGE! 
......we have a Beautiful Condo ($1898) in the HEART of Rockville/Bethesda that's MOVE-IN READY. 
What does "MOVE-IN READY" mean?.... 
that means furniture, parking, storage, concierge, gym -ALL SET UP.... READY for YOU!! 
Let alone the LOCATION convenient to NIH, UHUS and Walter Reed. 
- You have EASY ACCESS to EVERYTHING in DOWNTOWN DC, being blocks from Grosvenor Metro, 355 (Rockville pike) and I270/I495 We understand it SAVES TIME and MONEY for YOU.... 
so we just INCLUDED it ALL for you!! 
That's a dedicated PRIVATE GARAGE PARKING spot (at least $40/mo) and STORAGE worth (at least $60/mo)..... 
And ALSO TOP-SHELF Ethan Allen FURNISHING worth at LEAST $300/mo!! 
....at total of $400 expenses, HANDLED for you! 
Also included is PROFESSIONAL property management to KEEP your home ACCOUNTED for. 
But don't listen to me, I'll be happy to send you our public reviews from previous tenants! 
Your Home Decor:
- Luxury finish from Granite Countertops to Walnut Hardwood Floors, 
- Fine FURNISHING: Ethan Allen Queen Size Bed w/ overhead shelf & side tables, Ethan Allen TV & Entertainment Stand, Leather Sofa, 46" Sharp Aquos TV, Rustic Wood Dining Table, West Elm Coffee Table, washer and dryer 
- Walk-out balcony with scenic view 
Resort-like Fitness Center 
-Fully equipped Fitness Club overlooking courtyard and pool 
-Flat-screen televisions 
Outdoor Recreation Area 
-Courtyard with BBQ 
-Pool with sunning deck 
-Tennis court 
-Park-like setting with jogging trail 
Building Features: 
-Elegant marble lobby with 24-hour concierge service 
-Media room for private screenings 
-WiFi-enabled Resident Lounge 
Great Location: 
-Directly across from Grosvenor/Strathmore Metro 
-Instant access to the Capital Beltway, 270 and 355 
-Minutes to downtown Bethesda and Rockville 
-Moments from the new Strathmore Arts Center 
-Convenient to Rock Creek Park 
The Deal: 
- The home is available June 15 
- Short-term lease AVAILABLE (min 6 months) 
- Electric and cable the resident is responsible for (water is included) 
- credit check (640+) 
- proof of employment 
- 1 month rent security deposit

Description:
UNIT FOR RENT OR SALE: 10401 Grosvenor Place N. Bethesda, MD 20852
- Largest and rarest unit in the building (~1700 square feet): Currently, 2 bedrooms/3 bathrooms however can be easily converted back to a 3 bedrooms.
- Walking distance from Grosvenor Metro
- Short distance from NIH, Walter Reed, Downtown Bethesda, and easy access to 495/270
- Great school district
- Unit is in a building with 24/7 security, concierge services, supermarket, salon, dry cleaning, exercise room, pool, party room, walking path to lake, and state of the art laundry facilities. 
- TV/Sitting area,lots of walk-in closets and dressing room. large living room and dining room, comfortably large kitchen(own entrance from the outside) with new stainless steel french door refrigerator & dishwasher. 
- One assigned garage space and plenty of free parking spaces in the front and sides of the building.
AVAILABLE NOVEMBER 1 2017 - $2650 per month rent
Please contact Fred for showings.

Description: Large one bedroom one bathroom available in Grosvenor Park 1 for rent. The unit was renovated less than four years ago. Beautiful kitchen with granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances. Lots of storage, with custom shelving in all three closets, one of the three closets is a large walk-in. The outside patio is huge and leads directly into Grosvenor Park. The apartment is a five minute walk to the Grosvenor-Strathmore Metro on the Red Line. The building has an outdoor pool, a community roof top, a laundry room and a gym onsite along with 24/7 front desk staff. Several shops and restaurants nearby. Located down the street from NIH and Walter Reed. Minutes away from Downtown Bethesda.

Description:
AVAILABLE SEPTEMBER!
2 BEDROOM 2 BATH CONDO - GROUND FLOOR UNIT!
FOR RENT BY OWNER: JERRY ANTOSH
*CALL TODAY* 301-602-9081
5921 BARBADOS PLACE, NORTH BETHESDA, MD
Rent $2300/mo - Deposit $2300 (12-MONTH LEASE)
TENANT RESPONSIBLE FOR CABLE AND ELECTRIC
CONDO QUICK FACTS:
* 	2 BR, 2 BA GROUND FLOOR UNIT
* 	1000 SF PARTIALLY FURNISHED OPTION (LIVING + DINING ROOMS)
* 	NEXT TO MAILBOXES AND PARK ENTRANCE
* 	RESERVED PARKING SPOT
* 	INTERIOR UPDATES (wood floors/granite) 
* 	FIREPLACE AND TERRACE/DECK
* 	IN-UNIT WASHER/DRYER
* 	STORAGE CLOSET
* 	TWO LARGE HALL CLOSETS
* 	POOL AND TENNIS CLUB MEMBERSHIP
* 	TV / CABLE READY (LARGE 3D TV PROVIDED)
* 	PET FRIENDLY NEIGHBORHOOD
*Optional - living room and dining room optional to come furnished 
ABOUT THE ROOMS
- The smaller bedroom has a large closet and bathroom right outside. Room has large windows and can fit queen size bed, dresser, nightstand, and long bookcase. 
- The master bedroom has two (2) large closets and private bathroom with a standup shower AND a separate a bathtub. Has large windows and can fit a king bed, desk, 2 nightstands, dresser and bookcase.

-ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED - Including premium Direct TV and Internet. You pay $1200/month flat rate for all living expenses
-Large fenced in backyard for medium to large dogs
-Available October 1st with 1 year lease and first month and one month rent as deposit to get back at end of lease.
-Basement Apartment in house in Olney offered for quiet single or couple, by quiet couple

Dogs ok with successful, peaceful introduction to my own dog. Large kennel on property.

Description: Timberlawn Crescent is North Bethesda's best-kept secret. This incredibly convenient, pet friendly, neighborhood community offers apartments and townhomes with features like cathedral ceilings and private, ground-level courtyards and entries. Located in a quiet area of North Bethesda, Timberlawn Crescent's residents are always within an arm's reach of wonderful dining and shopping destinations.

Description: Discover a new kind of community at The Stories at Congressional Plaza in Rockville, MD. This boutique, pet-friendly community features 48 inspired apartment homes ranging from one to three bedrooms with open floor plans and thoughtful features designed with well-being in mind. Amenities include a state-of-the-art fitness center, a beautiful courtyard patio with gas grills, and a club room with a fully equipped kitchen -- in addition to unlimited access to the pool, theater room and guest suite located just next door at our sister property, The Crest at Congressional Plaza. Central to The Stories concept are our core principles of The Stories - Connection, Access, and Simplicity - and strives to understand each resident's story and vision for his or her next chapter. It's an intimate community where you live life on your terms -- with access to everything you want and personalized services for everything you need. It's where a healthy lifestyle and a strong community combine to create a whole new world of possibility. Availability is limited - call or visit us for a tour of The Stories today.

On your own terms.

You are less than 1 mile to GROVESNOR METRO (can walk or take bus) and 270/ 495/ shops/ county park.1 dog may be considered for addt l rent.

Great location with easy access to 270 Metro and Downtown Rockville. Dogs OK on a case by case basis.

Description: Upscale condo building with marble entry. This corner unit comes with lots of windows & many custom features . Includes hardwood flooring corian counter tops custom closets & lots of recessed lighting . Master BR with large super sized walk-in closet. Home has been retrofitted to improve wheel chair accessibility . Next to KF Village Center. Walk or take Free Shuttle To Metro.

Description: Clean and meticulously maintained brick rambler in Randolph Hills convenient to Bethesda Naval (Walter Reed) Rockville Pick shopping and restaurants. Owner will consider a small dog under 30 lbs or a cat with additional deposit. Fenced back yard. Finished basement. No more than 3 people need credit score in mid-600s or above and one person must make 54 000 or more. Move-in ready. NON-smokers!

Description: Beautiful luxury Cndo.Very spacious open floor plan lrg living rm w/ built in bookcase plus balcony. Freshly painted walls & brand new carpet. Huge master bdrm w/ walkin closet & master bath. Across the street from King Farm Village Cntr. Walking distance to Shady Grove Metro Shopping Dining & much more! Secured building & garage. Provides a shuttle to and from Shady Grove Metro. A MUST SEE!!

Large living room and enclosed sun room can be used year round. Washer/Dryer in unit. Walk-in closet in Master BR. Lrg storage closet. 1 assigned parking space and plenty of open spaces. Description: Live in the center of everything while tucked away in the trees. Renovated 2nd floor condo features all you could ever need and more. Plenty of windows and sunlight 2 large bedrooms both with big walk-in closets and 2 full bathrooms. Ideal roommate setup as bedrooms are on opposite sides of the unit. Water and trash included; gas cooking. Electric central AC. Pets Ok on case by case

Water and trash included; gas cooking. Electric central AC. Pets Ok on case by case

Big cozy Murphy Bed. ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED. Common Laundry Room on the SAME FLOOR as unit. Reserved parking space. This can fit so many situations and needs.

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Ice Maker
* Oven
* Range
* Refrigerator

Renovated apartment is available for rent. Only serious inquiries.

Description:
(800) 331-0646 - Spacious, stylish, and renovated condo home located perfectly with every convenience at your fingertips. Enjoy an easy commute anywhere with I-270, 370 and 28 within quick access giving you more time to enjoy the surrounding entertainment with family. Shopping, cinemas, and downtown Rockville with its many nature trails, parks, historical museums, and restaurants will keep your whole family busy and active making memories together. Throughout the main living area is new hardwood flooring making for a stunning and homey atmosphere and easy to keep clean. Living and dining area are wonderfully open making the space seem larger and bright. The kitchen features a see through service window allowing the family chef to effortlessly take part in the family festivities. An incredible layout allows everyone their own space with a roomy master suite complete with private bath and walk in closet, and two additional bedrooms one being a spacious loft. Deep skylights also make this lovely home stand apart offering beautiful and natural lighting throughout the home. A walk out balcony allows you to relax and unwind with a view to enjoy. Call Marketplace Homes at 1-800-331-0646 to schedule a showing and see if this is the right home for you.
(RLNE3539974) Other Amenities - Unfurnished, Parking, Smoke Free, Balcony. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range, Oven, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer, Microwave. Description:
(240) 994-9785 - Beautiful 3 Level Row Home in the Willows of Potomac! - Welcome to your new brick front row home in the sought after Willows of Potomac community. With 3 full levels, 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms, this house comes with plenty of space and even more charm.
Walk in your front door and notice the gorgeous hardwood floors throughout. The ground level features a cozy family room that exits through sliding doors into the large, fenced-in backyard. Walk up the stairs onto the main level with its expansive kitchen equipped with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. Turn right into the intimate and sunlit living area, or left into the separate dining room which exits onto the expansive deck overlooking the backyard. Go up one more flight of stairs and find the 3 bedrooms, including master suite. Your property also has a garage and driveway off the street, and in the front of the house.
Your new home is part of the Willows of Potomac community with facilities including pool, tennis and basketball courts, club house and fitness room. With nearby shopping, coffee shops and restaurants you are right off Shady Grove Rd, next to I-270, public transportation and the metro, and close to the Universities at Shady Grove Campus and Johns Hopkins University.
Don't miss this great deal!! 
Please email Matt Sweeney at Matt@StreamlineManagement.com to schedule a showing.
Lease Terms:
- 12-month minimum lease
- No smoking inside the home
- Pets accepted on a case by case basis
- Tenant is responsible for all utilities
- Available September 1st
To Apply:
Please visit www.StreamlineManagement.com, click on available properties section, click on the apply now button next to this listing. Please fill out the entire application, attach any and all supporting docs, and pay the $40 application fee per applicant.
(RLNE3444944)

Description:
(240) 997-3585 - Bright 3 Bed 2.5 Bath Townhouse Blocks to Rockville Metro Station! - Your Home Awaits! Bright and Lovely 3 Bed 2.5 Bath Townhouse In Quiet Charles Walk Community Minutes from Rockville Metro Station and Maryvale Park 
This lovely and spacious townhouse is perfectly situated in a quiet and friendly neighborhood just minutes from the Rockville metro station, the movie theatre, restaurants and shops of Rockville Town Center and an inviting community park. Come home by entering the bright, tiled split foyer. Steps lead up to the townhouse's three spacious, private bedrooms. The master bedroom (12x11) includes a convenient walk-in closet and a full bathroom. Two additional bedrooms and a full hall bath complete the spacious upper floor. All bedrooms are recently and plushly carpeted. Stairs from the entrance foyer lead down to the large living area, giving the main space of the home an open floor plan. Relax inside in the carpeted living room (19x13) or go through the sliding glass doors to your own private back patio full of lush greenery. Walk down the hill from the patio and you are enjoying beautiful Maryvale Community Park. Back at home, cook great meals in the fully equipped kitchen, complete with gas range, refrigerator, dishwasher, and garbage disposal. Dine in a light and separate dining nook(9x8) just off the kitchen. Perfect for guests, a half bath is conveniently located off the living room. A laundry room with washer and dryer also offers lots of storage space. Parking is available with assigned spots. Pets Negotiable with deposit! Make an appointment today to see this beautiful home as this townhouse will not last! 
Call WMS at 240-997-3585 to inquire. Available now. 
FALL SPECIAL: Application Fee(s) waived!
(RLNE2455124) Other Amenities - Other- assigned parking in lot. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description: Twinbrook, 3 bedroom, 1 bath Single Family Detached Home. Great condition; new siding,windows, storage shed, kitchen floor and kitchen & bath tile; freshly painted, super clean. Gas (furnace, stove & hot water heater), central air, dishwasher, washer and dryer. Ample storage including separate storage building; yard and off-street parking. Close to public transportation: Metrorail, Metro and Rid-On bus lines. Shopping, library and recreation center nearby. Area schools: Twinbrook Elementary, Julius West Middle and Richard Montgomery High. Minimum 1 year lease, 2 year available. $2100 plus all utilities. No smoking. No pets. Inquiries by telephone: 240-421-3206.

Description:
(240) 988-8008 - Stunning 3 Bed 3.5 Bath Townhome In Sought After King Farm - Welcome home to your GORGEOUS 3000+sqft 3 level, end unit town home in KING FARM! This is one the best locations in King Farm, just steps away from everywhere you want to be.
Enter into your stunning foyer with wood floors throughout the main level and a beautiful gas fireplace. Enjoy cooking and entertaining in your large eat in kitchen with ceramic tile that features a breakfast bar, beautiful counters, gas cook top and pantry. This leads to 1 of 2 decks on which you can enjoy your favorite beverage. Not to mention there's a convenient powder room as well.
Upstairs there's a LARGE master bedroom (with it's own private balcony) with 2 walk in closets and a great master bath. On the same level there are 2 more bedrooms and a full bath and bedroom level laundry room.
The full finished basement features a full bathroom, tons of storage space as well as a expansive common area.
Finish it off with a 2 car garage and an unbeatable location and your got your dream home.
There's so much to say about this home but you need to see it to believe it. Email Noah Trager at Noah@StreamlineManagement.com to see this outstanding home today!

Description:
(443) 261-4915 - BEST DEAL IN KING FARM! FIRST MONTH RENT IS FREE.. $3195 OFF..Newly renovated end unit townhouse with a 2 car garage, 4 bedrooms and 3.5 baths available in coveted king farm community of Rockville for immediate move in. Hardwood floor on first floor, upgraded tile floor in kitchen and breakfast area, upgraded padding and carpets on second and third floors. Stainless steel appliances and fireplace. Bright and sunny breakfast nook for refreshing coffee and breakfast. In walking distance to shops, restaurants, grocery, bank. Easy and convenient access to Shady Grove metro station, king farm shuttle available. Children's playground, jogging trails, and dog walking nearby. Access to state of the art community gym and swimming pool. Easily accessible to child day care and school. Hurry, this offer which is no brainer won't last for long! Contact agent immediately to arrange visit. You will be glad you did so. Pets are welcome!

Description: GRACIOUS AND AFFORDABLE SENIOR LIVING! Ring House is a warm, welcoming senior living community for those 62 or better or disabled. Located in the heart of Rockville across the street from restaurants, shopping, and the Jewish Community Center, Ring House offers care free living that includes a kosher breakfast and dinner, bi-weekly housekeeping, emergency call system, daily activities, and group transportation included in the monthly fee. Studio, 1 bedroom and 2 bedroom apartments have been updated and may include kitchens with granite and stainless steel and bathrooms with walk in showers. An art studio, fitness center, theater, cafe and bank are available. Enjoy lectures, musical performances and outings to nearby cultural sites.

Description: Welcome to a new and unique apartment community created exclusively for seniors featuring spacious one and two bedroom apartment homes. The Gardens of Traville, for adults age 62 and better, combines the conveniences of premier independent living with the advantages of a rental community. Apartment homes feature fully equipped kitchens, upgraded bathrooms and emergency response systems. The community offers a hair salon, computer center, wellness center and game room, as well as large community lounges to host special events and activities. We are conveniently located in a tranquil area of Rockville adjacent to Traville Shopping Center. Lease today and learn why our residents love to call us home!

Property Info:
* Built in 1959

Images: ![Primary Photo - 100 & 102 East Argyle Street](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/hDECeqrpioXkg0oxWmqWbo3s3785GMV-GANdwNf-llI/117/100-102-east-argyle-street-rockville-md-primary-photo.jpg) ![Building Photo - 100 & 102 East Argyle Street](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/YNjWdxexBHFEW6YBhWbKGzCPQWnmZZ7OnMP1i1SIrkk/117/100-102-east-argyle-street-rockville-md-building-photo.jpg)
Description:
Walk to the metro!
Walk to work!
Walk to restaurants, movie and bars! 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment for rent in a clean, old, ugly building. Top floor unit with windows in every room. Monthly rent includes water, gas, electric and heat. Outdoor grilling and picnic area for tenants! Parking pass for one vehicle. Laundry on-site (coin-operated.) Conveniently located to I-270 and Rockville Pike. 4 blocks to Town Center - Regal Cinemas, Ben & Jerry's, Starbucks, American Tap Room, Buffalo Wild Wings, Dawson's Market, Rockville Library and more*. Three minute RideOn bus ride to Amtrak, MARC and the Red Line Metro at Rockville station; 30 minutes to Metro Center Station, Downtown DC. Near Dogwood Park and Courthouse Square Park. 7 minute drive to Congressional Plaza and Montrose Shopping Plaza
8 minute drive via Norbeck Rd. to Red Gate Golf Course
6 minute drive to Montgomery College *http://rockvilletownsquare.com
*No pets (Sorry)
*No garbage fees Please call Sahara, Agent, at 347-218-2831 or email to schedule an appointment to view the apartment. Realty Investments Corporation 3702 Perry Avenue
Kensington, MD 20895
301-933-1551
